entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening then becoming light near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning with 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Clearing in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 11 February 2023
